00056 class KVIRC_API KviThemeInfo : public KviHeapObject
00057 {
00058 public:
00059         KviThemeInfo();
00060         ~KviThemeInfo();
00061 protected:
00062         QString m_szName;               //< name of the theme
00063         QString m_szVersion;            //< version of the theme
00064         QString m_szSubdirectory;       //< subdirectory of $LOCALKVIRCDIR/themes where the theme is saved to (not always used)
00065         QString m_szAbsoluteDirectory;  //< absolute directory where the theme should be saved to (or is loaded from)
00066         QString m_szAuthor;             //< author of the theme
00067         QString m_szDescription;        //< description of the theme
00068         QString m_szDate;               //< theme creation date
00069         QString m_szApplication;        //< theme creation (KVIrc) version
00070         QString m_szThemeEngineVersion; //< the theme engine version that saved this theme
00071 
00072         QString m_szLastError;          //< reported when some function fails
00073

00075         QPixmap m_pixScreenshotMedium;  //< the medium screenshot pixmap
00076         QPixmap m_pixScreenshotSmall;   //< the small screenshot pixmap
